title: 6-Piece Hijama Cupping Therapy Set ? Vacuum Suction Massage Cups with Pull-Out Pump | Pain Relief, Blood Circulation, Relaxation & Muscle Recovery Kit
description:
Discover the power of traditional healing with this 6-Piece Hijama Cupping Therapy Set, designed for safe and effective cupping sessions. The set includes durable, transparent cups and a manual pull-out vacuum pump, allowing precise control over suction intensity for a comfortable and personalized experience.

Cupping therapy is known to improve blood circulation, release muscle stiffness, and remove toxins from the body. It helps in reducing pain, fatigue, and inflammation, making it an ideal choice for athletes, wellness enthusiasts, or anyone seeking relaxation and rejuvenation.

Made from high-quality, reusable materials, this cupping kit is lightweight, portable, and easy to clean?perfect for both home users and professional therapists. Whether used for muscle recovery, stress relief, or overall wellness, this set brings the ancient art of Hijama into your modern self-care routine.
